languages.text: {n}Маражай молчит несколько мгновений, поигрывая загадочным предметом в руке.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, ненавидите чуждых вашему роду созданий — вашу ненависть питает животный страх и понимание вашей ничтожности. Для нас же ваше племя — скот, существующий для забоя и развлечений. Порой мы используем вас в наших маленьких играх, но по настоящему вовлекать грязных животных в политику Комморры... и тем более в распри между кабалами... мало есть худших способов покрыть позором и себя, и свой кабал".

{n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай молчит несколько мгновений, поигрывая загадочным предметом в руке.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, ненавидите чуждых вашему роду созданий — вашу ненависть питает животный страх и понимание вашей ничтожности. Для нас же ваше племя — скот, существующий для забоя и развлечений. Порой мы используем вас в наших маленьких играх, но по настоящему вовлекать грязных животных в политику Комморры... и тем более в распри между кабалами... мало есть худших способов покрыть позором и себя, и свой кабал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuel by animalistic fear and an understanding of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exists to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve the filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone the feuding between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai garde le silence quelques instants, tout en continuant à jouer avec l'objet mystérieux dans sa main.{/n} « Vous autres, mon-keigh, haïssez les créatures étrangères à votre espèce, et cette haine est alimentée par une peur primitive et la conscience de votre propre insignifiance. Pour nous, vous n'êtes que du bétail tout juste bon à être abattu ou à nous divertir. Nous nous servons parfois de vous pour nos petits jeux, mais impliquer des brutes épaisses dans les affaires de Commorragh... sans parler des querelles entre les Kabales... Je n'imagine pas pire façon d'apporter le déshonneur sur soi-même et sur sa Kabale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai garde le silence quelques instants, tout en continuant à jouer avec l'objet mystérieux dans sa main.{/n} « Vous autres, mon-keigh, haïssez les créatures étrangères à votre espèce, et cette haine est alimentée par une peur primitive et la conscience de votre propre insignifiance. Pour nous, vous n'êtes que du bétail tout juste bon à être abattu ou à nous divertir. Nous nous servons parfois de vous pour nos petits jeux, mais impliquer des brutes épaisses dans les affaires de Commorragh... sans parler des querelles entre les Kabales... Je n'imagine pas pire façon d'apporter le déshonneur sur soi-même et sur sa Kabale. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋沉默了片刻，把玩着手中的神秘物品。{/n}“你们这些猴子，你们憎恨一切其他种族。这种憎恨源于你们原始的恐惧，以及你们渺小的存在本身。对我们而言，你们不过是我们用来屠宰、娱乐的活畜。有的时候，我们会在小小的游戏中利用你们，但只有打算自取其辱的人，才会把你们这种肮脏的畜生卷入科摩罗的政治斗争……更不用说阴谋团之间的争斗……这只会为我们的阴谋团带来耻辱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはしばらくの間沈黙し、手の中の不思議な物体を弄んでいる。{/n}「モン＝ケイ。お前は自らの種族とは異質な者を憎んでいる。そしてその憎悪は、原始的な恐怖と、自分たちが取るに足らない存在であるという自覚により増幅されてる。俺たちにとって、お前たちは屠殺され、俺たちを楽しませるために存在する家畜だ。時にはちょっとした遊びに利用することもあるが、この薄汚い獣をコモラフの政治に巻き込むとは…ましてや陰謀団間の確執になど…陰謀団とそこに属する者の名誉を傷つけるのに、これ以上の方法はないな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはしばらくの間沈黙し、手の中の不思議な物体を弄んでいる。{/n}「モン＝ケイ。お前は自らの種族とは異質な者を憎んでいる。そしてその憎悪は、原始的な恐怖と、自分たちが取るに足らない存在であるという自覚により増幅されてる。俺たちにとって、お前たちは屠殺され、俺たちを楽しませるために存在する家畜だ。時にはちょっとした遊びに利用することもあるが、この薄汚い獣をコモラフの政治に巻き込むとは…ましてや陰謀団間の確執になど…陰謀団とそこに属する者の名誉を傷つけるのに、これ以上の方法はないな」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schweigt kurz und spielt dabei mit einem geheimnisvollen Gegenstand in seiner Hand.{/n} "Ihr, Chem-Pan-Sey, hasst fremdartige Kreaturen – der Hass wird genährt durch Urängste und das Wissen um Eure Bedeutungslosigkeit. Für uns seid ihr bloß Vieh, das geschlachtet werden und für unsere Unterhaltung sorgen muss. Manchmal benutzen wir Euch für unsere kleinen Spielchen, aber Euch widerwärtige Wilde in die Politik Commorraghs zu involvieren ... oder sogar in die Fehden zwischen den Kabalen ... mehr Schande über sich und seine Kabale zu bringen, ist kaum möglich."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schweigt kurz und spielt dabei mit einem geheimnisvollen Gegenstand in seiner Hand.{/n} "Ihr, Chem-Pan-Sey, hasst fremdartige Kreaturen – der Hass wird genährt durch Urängste und das Wissen um Eure Bedeutungslosigkeit. Für uns seid ihr bloß Vieh, das geschlachtet werden und für unsere Unterhaltung sorgen muss. Manchmal benutzen wir Euch für unsere kleinen Spielchen, aber Euch wilde Grobiane in die Politik Commorraghs zu verwickeln ... oder sogar in die Fehden zwischen den Kabalen ... mehr Schande über sich und seine Kabale zu bringen, ist kaum möglich."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda callado durante un rato, jugueteando con el misterioso objeto que tiene en la mano.{/n} «Los mon-keigh odiáis a las criaturas ajenas a vuestra especie; y este odio se ve alimentado por un miedo visceral y la consciencia de vuestra propia insignificancia. Para nosotros no sois más que ganado; existís para ser masacrados y para divertirnos. A veces os utilizamos en nuestros jueguecitos, pero involucrar a bestias como vosotros en la política de Commorragh... no digamos ya en las disputas entre Kábalas... existen pocas formas peores de deshonrarse uno mismo y a su Kábala».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda callado durante un rato, jugueteando con el misterioso objeto que tiene en la mano.{/n} «Los mon-keigh odiáis a las criaturas ajenas a vuestra especie; y este odio se ve alimentado por un miedo visceral y el descubrimiento de vuestra propia insignificancia. Para nosotros no sois más que ganado; existís para ser masacrados y para divertirnos. A veces os utilizamos en nuestros jueguecitos, pero involucrar al ganado en la política de Commorragh... no digamos ya en las disputas entre kábalas... existen pocas formas peores de deshonrarse uno mismo y a su kábala».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bir süre sessiz kalıp elindeki gizemli nesneyle oynuyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keighler, türünüze yabancı yaratıklardan nefret ediyorsunuz. Bu nefret, ilkel korkularınızla ve önemsizliğinizin farkında oluşunuzla daha da körükleniyor. Bizim gözümüzde katledilecek besi hayvanlarısınız, eğlencesiniz. Bazen küçük oyunlarımıza alet etsek de sizin gibi pis barbarları Commorragh politikalarına dâhil etmek, hatta Kaballar arasındaki anlaşmazlıklarda rol vermek... Kendimizin ve Kabalımızın onurunu bundan daha fazla ayaklar altına alacak pek bir şey düşünemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai is silent for a few moments, playing with the mysterious object in his hand.{/n} "You, mon-keigh, hate creatures alien to your kind — and this hatred is fuelled by primal fear and awareness of your insignificance. To us, you are cattle that exist to be butchered and to entertain us. Sometimes we use you in our little games, but to involve you filthy brutes in the politics of Commorragh... let alone in feuds between the Kabals... there are few worse ways to bring dishonour to oneself and one's Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bir süre sessiz kalıyor ve elindeki gizemli nesneyle oynuyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keigh, türünüze yabancı yaratıklardan nefret ediyorsunuz ve bu nefret, ilkel korkularınızla ve önemsizliğinizin farkında oluşunuzla daha da körükleniyor. Bizim için siz katledilecek besi hayvanlarısınız, birer eğlencesiniz. Bazen sizi küçük oyunlarımızda kullanıyoruz ama sizin gibi pis barbarları Commorragh politikalarına dâhil etmek, hatta Kaballar arasındaki anlaşmazlıklarda size bir rol vermek... Kişinin kendisinin ve Kabal'ının onurunu daha fazla ayaklar altına alınmasını sağlayacak fazla şey yoktur."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
